one_reviews_text: i love this ghosts.they loock like those of luigi s mansion.the game Unfortunately instead not based type a series of  levels whit a 3 stars of raking.but a endelss waves.in more waves .the difficulty increases after a few waves, making the game over after a few minutes of play and we start all over from the beginning.I would have made the levels and once overcome I started from the last one. mechanics of enemies is good, shooting good.
This game is great for fans that want to experience arcade base games in VR. The game is also aesthetically pleasing. Great game for $10!

review_title: Pretty fun but dosent last too long
one_reviews_text: Ok, for ten bucks its not bad. But content is lacking and there is no variety. It is one level and one mode. The graphics are good, everything is smooth as far as gamplay and the idea is great but if it can have more depth to it, this could be a hit. Multiplayer with other people would be a great idea. 4 stars because it has a good concept and is put together well. Since it is early access i hope more is to come.
review_feedback: We have updated the game with several more levels, a trophy system and some new power ups, give it another look! Thanks for the review!
